sub_title: Senior Full Stack Developer @ Settly B.V.
summary:
I am a consistent learner. I learn and adapt myself with the world every single day.

I have over 12 years of JavaScript/TypeScript, React, PHP/Laravel, Node.js & MySQL experiences. I am a big fan TDD, cloud first development and containerization technology like Docker.

projects.description: This application manages is being developed for BRAC's Grievance Management Unit. projects.title: Pollishomaj Application of Community Empowerment Programme (CEP), BRAC
